Techno Peep - Bundle Pack - Robot Red
kDesc

Move to the groove with Techno Peep! As the hottest gadget on the market, it's three for one with extra Peep fun! Bring your Heavy Pet Peep into your apartment and let the fun begin. You can control your Peep with custom animations and moves. Take him outside of your apartment as a Companion or place him on display in your apartment in his Peep-a-Boo box. Collect them all and stack them for all to see!
This set includes the following items.


・Techno Peep - Robot Red
 ・Techno Peep - Static Mini - Robot Red
 ・Techno Peep - Heavy Pet - Robot Red


※ All of the above items will become available in their relevant categories on purchasing this bundle. [#Legal]

Va t'éclater avec Techno Peep! Comme le gadget le plus en vogue sur le marche. C'est 3 en un avec peep fun supplémentaire. Ramène ton Heavy Pet Peep à ton appartement et que la fête commence. Tu peux contrôler ton Peep avec des animations et manœuvres personnalisées. Prends le a l'extérieur de ton appartement comme compagnon ou expose le à ton appartement dans une boite Peep-a-Boo. Rassemble les tous et entasse les pour que tous puissent les voir![#Legal]

Tanz dich in den Groove mit Techno Peep! Als heißestes Zubehör überhaupt bekommst du ihn im Dreier-Pack mit extra Peep-Spaß! Bring dein Heavy Pet Peep in deine Wohnung und der Spaß beginnt. Du kannst dein Peep mit benutzerdefinierten Animationen und Bewegungen steuern. Nimm ihn als Gefährten mit nach draußen oder stelle ihn in deiner Wohnung in seiner Peep-a-Boo Kiste aus. Sammle sie alle und stelle sie für Alle zur Schau aus! [#Legal]

Muoviti al tempo con Techno Peep! Come il gadget piú desiderato sul mercato, e divertimento extra Peep al tre per uno! Porta il tuo Heavy Pet Peep nel tuo appartamento e che il divertimento abbia inizio. Puoi controllare il tuo Peep con animazioni e movimenti fatti a posta. Portalo fuori dal tuo appartamento come il tuo Companion oppure mettilo in mostra dentro il tuo appartamento nella sua scatola Peep-a-Boo. Colleziona tutti quanti e mettili in mostra perché tutti possano vederli![#Legal]

Muévete al ritmo con Techno Peep! Siendo el gadget más deseado en el mercado, es más diversión Peep al tres por uno! Lleva a tu Heavy Pet Peep a tu departamento y que empieze la diversión. Puedes controlar a tu Peep con animaciones y movimientos personalizados. Sácalo de tu departamento como Companion o pónlo de muestra en tu departamento en su propia caja Peep-a-Boo. Colecciónalos todos y amontónalos para que los vea todo el mundo![#Legal]
*Not Localised* Home_Object_25 [#Legal]

Techno Peep과 함께 신나는 댄스를! 마켓에서 가장 인기 있는 친구로, 추가 Peep으로 세 가지 즐거움을 누려보세요! Heavy Pet Peep을 아파트로 데려와 신나게 놀아 보세요. 사용자 지정 애니메이션과 모션으로 Peep을 컨트롤할 수 있습니다! 친구처럼 아파트 밖에 데려가거나 Peep-A-Boo 박스에 디스플레이된 Mini-Peep을 아파트에 데려다 놓아보세요. Mini-Peep을 모두 모아 친구들에게 자랑해 보세요!
본 세트에는 하기 아이템이 포함되어 있습니다. 


●Techno Peep - 로보트 레드
 ●Techno Peep - Static Mini - 로보트 레드
 ●Techno Peep - Heavy Pet - 로보트 레드


※ 상기 모든 아이템들은 이 번들 구입과 동시에 적절한 카테고리에서 이용할 수 있습니다. [#Legal]

Move to the groove with Techno Peep! As the hottest gadget on the market, it's three for one with extra Peep fun! Bring your Heavy Pet Peep into your apartment and let the fun begin. You can control your Peep with custom animations and moves. Take him outside of your apartment as a Companion or place him on display in your apartment in his Peep-a-Boo box. Collect them all and stack them for all to see!
This set includes the following items.


・Techno Peep - Robot Red
 ・Techno Peep - Static Mini - Robot Red
 ・Techno Peep - Heavy Pet - Robot Red


※ All of the above items will become available in their relevant categories on purchasing this bundle. [#Legal]

Techno Peep令您輕鬆快活！作為市面上最受歡迎的機械人，為您帶來無窮Peep樂趣!帶Heavy PetPeep進入您家，盡情享樂。您可以用自訂動態和動作來控制Peep。他可以作為隨身夥伴和您一起外出，或者您可以將他放進專用Peep-A-Boo盒子並成為家居擺設。集齊全套，向朋友炫耀一下吧！本組合包含以下商品：


●Techno Peep - 金屬紅
 ●Techno Peep 靜態迷你公仔 - 金屬紅
 ●Techno Peep - Heavy Pet - 金屬紅


※ 購買組合包後，以上所有物品都會加入相關的類別中。[#Legal]
